The `RUN` procedure forces the job to be run, even if its state is broken.

```text
RUN(<job> BINARY_INTEGER)
```

**Parameter**

`job`

 Identifier of the job to be run.

**Examples**

Force a job to be run.

```text
BEGIN
    DBMS_JOB.RUN(104);
END;
```
